activities.name: Model UN Secretary-General
activities.impact: Increased participation by 40%, established scholarship fund

activities.name: Immigration Legal Aid
activities.description: Provided Spanish translation for legal consultations
activities.impact: Assisted 50+ families with asylum and citizenship applications

core_values.description: Fighting for equality and human rights

defining_moments.title: Family Immigration Struggle
defining_moments.description: Helping parents navigate complex immigration system
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep understanding of systemic barriers and injustice

defining_moments.title: Navigating Family Immigration Challenges
defining_moments.description: When my parents faced a complex immigration process, I stepped up to help them navigate the legal maze. This experience deepened my understanding of systemic barriers and fueled my passion for justice.

defining_moments.title: Transforming Model UN Participation
defining_moments.description: As Secretary-General, I faced the challenge of declining Model UN participation. By implementing new strategies and a scholarship fund, I increased engagement by 40%, demonstrating problem-solving and leadership.

defining_moments.title: Bridging Cultural Divides Through Translation
defining_moments.description: Volunteering as a translator for immigrant families, I encountered the challenge of cultural misunderstandings. By facilitating communication, I connected communities and reinforced my commitment to cultural bridge-building.
